workshoptitle: Devops deployment of Helm charts with Provenance and Container instance via Shell stage

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Provision the infrastructure
tutorials.description: Instruction to provision OCI devops and related infrastructure

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Get to know more about OCI Devops components
tutorials.description: Get to know more about OCI devops resources and configurations

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Shell stage deployment
tutorials.description: Use OCI Devops Shell stage to deploy and update OCI Container Instance.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Helm chart deployment
tutorials.description: Use OCI Devops Helm chart stage to deploy with provenance and integrity checks

tutorials.title: Lab5: Cleanup of lab resources
tutorials.description: Clean all the lab infra components
